vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.9.7;
son of: Haman (H2001);
brother of: Parshandatha (H6577), Dalphon (H1813), Poratha (H6334), Adalia (H0118), Aridatha (H0743), Parmashta (H6534), Arisai (H0747), Aridai (H0742) and Vaizatha (H2055)
§ Aspatha = "the enticed gathered"
the third son of Haman
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞斯帕他 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "誘人的聚集"
哈曼的第三個兒子 {#斯 9:7|}
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚斯帕他 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "诱人的聚集"
哈曼的第三个儿子 {#斯 9:7|}
